pages.text: The Conductor is a block which, when powered by Redstone and a Switchboard is inserted, can transmit a single note to nearby players, Receivers, and Mechanical Maestros that just like the $(l:overview_transmitter)Transmitter$().$(br2)A Switchboard can be linked to a Conductor as its Transmitter source by right-clicking on a placed Conductor while holding the Switchboard.

pages.title: Conductor GUI
pages.text: Right clicking on a placed Conductor allows you to open the Conductor GUI and insert a Switchboard into the Switchboard slot. When a Switchboard is inserted you can configure the Switchboard properties using the GUI.

pages.title: Switchboard Properties
pages.text: Conductors use the following $(l:switchboard_properties)Switchboard Properties$():$(br2)- MIDI Channels$(br)- Broadcast Mode$(br)- Broadcast Note
